Uses of Interface
net.xqhs.flash.core.Entity

  • Packages that use Entity 
    Package Description
    example.compositePingPong
    The scenario of two agents which ping messages between them (one sends and one replies).
    example.echoAgent
    A simple deployment, testing the deployment of very basic scenarios.
    example.simplePingPong
    The scenario of two agents which ping messages between them (one sends and one replies).
    example.webSocketsDeployment
    Verifies: correct functioning of the websockets support infrastructure, in three different loading contexts (manual deployment, with deployment configuration and simple agents, and with deployment configuration and composite agents).
    net.xqhs.flash.core
    The package contains the core of Flash-MAS.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.agent
    The package contains the agent interface.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.agent.java
    Package containing classes related to the deployment of Java agents in Flash-MAS.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.composite
    The package contains classes related to the implementation ofCompositeAgent.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.control  
    net.xqhs.flash.core.monitoring  
    net.xqhs.flash.core.node
    The package contains classes needed for easily deploying Flash agents.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.shard
    The package contains interfaces and abstract classes for core agent features.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.support
    Core classes dealing with support items, such as communication and mobility.
    net.xqhs.flash.gui
    Classes related to automatic GUI generation.
    net.xqhs.flash.local
    Package that offers support for local communication.
    net.xqhs.flash.swingGui  
    net.xqhs.flash.webSocket  

    • Uses of Entity in example.compositePingPong

      Classes in example.compositePingPong that implement Entity 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  MonitoringTestShard
      An AgentShard implementation that monitors all agent events.
      class  PingBackTestComponent
      An AgentShard implementation that initially sends a message to another agent, it this agent is designated as initiator.
      class  PingTestComponent
      An AgentShard implementation that sends messages to other agents.

    • Uses of Entity in net.xqhs.flash.core

      Classes in net.xqhs.flash.core with type parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  ConfigurableEntity<P extends Entity<?>>
      This interface extends Entity with a method dedicated to configuring the entity, using a MultiTreeMap holding a tree of multi-maps.
      interface  Entity<P extends Entity<?>>
      An element in the deployment, be it a support infrastructure, an agent, a shard, etc.
      static interface  Entity.EntityProxy<C extends Entity<?>>
      Marker interface for classes that provide a proxy to an entity which is an instance of C.
      interface  Loader<T extends Entity<?>>
      A loader instance has the capability of creating new Entity instances.
      interface  RunnableEntity<P extends Entity<?>>
      This version of Entity adds the method Runnable.run(), enabling whoever holds a reference to this entity to also control the thread on which the entity executes.
      Subinterfaces of Entity in net.xqhs.flash.core 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  ConfigurableEntity<P extends Entity<?>>
      This interface extends Entity with a method dedicated to configuring the entity, using a MultiTreeMap holding a tree of multi-maps.
      interface  RunnableEntity<P extends Entity<?>>
      This version of Entity adds the method Runnable.run(), enabling whoever holds a reference to this entity to also control the thread on which the entity executes.
      Fields in net.xqhs.flash.core with type parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) static java.util.Map<Entity<?>,​java.lang.String> Entity.EntityIndex.register
      The register of all entities.
      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core with type parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <C extends Entity<P>>
      Entity.EntityProxy<C>      		 Entity.asContext()
      Returns a proxy to this entity.
      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core that return Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Entity<?> Loader.SimpleLoader.load​(MultiTreeMap configuration)  
      Entity<?> Loader.SimpleLoader.load​(MultiTreeMap configuration, java.util.List<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> context, java.util.List<MultiTreeMap> subordinateEntities)
      The method will attempt to instantiate a new entity, using the classpath from the "classpath" parameter in the configuration (as a simple key).
      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core with parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.String Entity.EntityIndex.print​(Entity<? extends Entity<?>> entity)
      Retrieves the printable string from the register.
      static java.lang.String Entity.EntityIndex.printGlobal​(Entity<? extends Entity<?>> entity)
      Retrieves an extended form of the printable string for this entity, which also identifies the local machine (making the string unique in the entire deployment).
      static java.lang.String Entity.EntityIndex.register​(java.lang.String entityType, Entity<? extends Entity<?>> entity)
      Registers an entry for an entity.
      Method parameters in net.xqhs.flash.core with type arguments of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean Entity.addGeneralContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>> context)
      Creates a link from a subordinate entity to an entity containing it in some way.
      T Loader.load​(MultiTreeMap configuration, java.util.List<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> context, java.util.List<MultiTreeMap> subordinateEntities)
      Loads a new instance of entity T and provides it with the given context, as well as with a flat (as opposed to the hierarchical structure provided by the configuration) list of entities that should be present in the context of this entity.
      Entity<?> Loader.SimpleLoader.load​(MultiTreeMap configuration, java.util.List<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> context, java.util.List<MultiTreeMap> subordinateEntities)
      The method will attempt to instantiate a new entity, using the classpath from the "classpath" parameter in the configuration (as a simple key).
      boolean Loader.preload​(MultiTreeMap configuration, java.util.List<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> context)
      Same as Loader.preload(MultiTreeMap), but performs the checks in the given context.
      boolean Loader.SimpleLoader.preload​(MultiTreeMap configuration, java.util.List<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> context)
      Context is not considered in any way.
      static java.lang.String Entity.EntityIndex.print​(Entity<? extends Entity<?>> entity)
      Retrieves the printable string from the register.
      static java.lang.String Entity.EntityIndex.printGlobal​(Entity<? extends Entity<?>> entity)
      Retrieves an extended form of the printable string for this entity, which also identifies the local machine (making the string unique in the entire deployment).
      static java.lang.String Entity.EntityIndex.register​(java.lang.String entityType, Entity<? extends Entity<?>> entity)
      Registers an entry for an entity.
      boolean Entity.removeGeneralContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>> context)
      Removes the from a subordinate entity to the specified context.

    • Uses of Entity in net.xqhs.flash.core.agent.java

      Classes in net.xqhs.flash.core.agent.java that implement Entity 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  JavaAgent
      This class marks the fact that an extending agent implementation is created ad-hoc; it does not offer any pre-implemented functionality.

      Classes in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite that implement Entity 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CompositeAgent
      This class implements an agent formed by shards and an event queue that allows shards to communicate among each other.

      protected java.util.ArrayList<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> CompositeAgent.agentContext
      The list of all contexts this agent is placed in, in the order in which they were added.
      Method parameters in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite with type arguments of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean CompositeAgent.addGeneralContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>> context)  
      Agent CompositeAgentLoader.load​(MultiTreeMap agentConfiguration, java.util.List<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> context, java.util.List<MultiTreeMap> subordinateEntities)
      The method loads all the information necessary for the creation of an agent and returns an Agent instance used to manage the life-cycle of the loaded agent.
      boolean CompositeAgentLoader.preload​(MultiTreeMap agentConfiguration, java.util.List<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> context)
      The method checks potential problems that could appear in the creation of an agent, as specified by the information in the argument.
      boolean CompositeAgent.removeGeneralContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>> context)

      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Node
      A Node instance embodies the presence of the framework on a machine, although multiple Node instances may exist on the same machine.

      A List containing the entities added in the context of this node, in the order in which they were added.
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<Entity<?>>> Node.registeredEntities
      A collection of all entities added in the context of this node, indexed by their names.

    • Uses of Entity in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard

      Subinterfaces of Entity in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  AgentShard
      A shard (also called a component) is characterized by its functionality, identified by means of its designation -- an instance of AgentShardDesignation.
      Classes in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard that implement Entity 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AgentShardCore
      This class serves as base for the implementation of agent shards.
      class  AgentShardGeneral
      The class extends AgentShardCore and offers additional functionality for AgentShard implementations, especially in working together with other (known types of) shards.
      class  IOShard  
      Method parameters in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard with type arguments of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean AgentShardCore.addGeneralContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>> context)  
      boolean AgentShardCore.removeGeneralContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>> context)  

    • Uses of Entity in net.xqhs.flash.core.support

      Subinterfaces of Entity in net.xqhs.flash.core.support 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  MessagingShard
      Interface for any shard offering messaging functionality to an entity.
      interface  Pylon
      This interface should be implemented by any persistent entity that exists on a Node and offers to agents services such as communication, mobility, directory, etc.
      Classes in net.xqhs.flash.core.support that implement Entity 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractMessagingShard
      Prototype class for shards offering messaging functionality, containing some general implementation-independent methods.
      class  AbstractNameBasedMessagingShard
      A simple extension of AbstractMessagingShard, which leaves to implement only AbstractMessagingShard.sendMessage(String, String, String) as an abstract method, and also the registration of a message receiver to the pylon.
      class  DefaultPylonImplementation
      Pylon for the default support infrastructure for agents.
      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core.support with type parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <C extends Entity<Node>>
      Entity.EntityProxy<C>      		 DefaultPylonImplementation.asContext()  
      Method parameters in net.xqhs.flash.core.support with type arguments of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean DefaultPylonImplementation.removeGeneralContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>> context)

      Classes in net.xqhs.flash.local that implement Entity 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  LocalPylon
      Simple support implementation that allows agents to send messages locally (inside the same JVM) based simply on agent name.
      static class  LocalPylon.SimpleLocalMessaging
      Simple implementation of AbstractMessagingShard, that uses agents' names as their addresses.

    • Uses of Entity in net.xqhs.flash.webSocket

      Classes in net.xqhs.flash.webSocket that implement Entity 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  WebSocketMessagingShard
      The WebSocketMessagingShard class manages the link between agent's messaging service and its pylon.
      class  WebSocketPylon
      WebSocket support implementation that allows agents to send messages whether they are inside the same JVM or not.
      class  WebSocketServerEntity
      The WebSocketServerEntity class manages the routing of messages between different entities.
      Method parameters in net.xqhs.flash.webSocket with type arguments of type Entity
